content: While exploring the mountains, try picking <style=Highlight>flowers</style> in new colors. They will surely inspire new Inspo Card ideas and teach you how to create a <style=Highlight>tricolor flower pot</style> unique to our planet.
info: 关于高山-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A想象中}The flowers I saw up in the highlands... they were a different color from the ones down below...
info: 关于高山-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A挠头}If it isn't too much to ask, I'd love to receive one from you. It would be wonderful to have one on the table at the Camp, hoho!
info: 关于高山-莫白_主流程文本3

content: You can jump up cliffs using the <style=Highlight>pogo stick</style> and look for different flora and fauna.
info: 关于高山-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A远眺}...Ah, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you're here! Mors and I both believe there's a different ecosystem up in the highlands.
info: 关于高山-莫白_主流程文本3
